name: 賀一平
objective:
本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文報告與論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習專技報告與研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文。
This course aims at developing graduate students’ skills in writing scientific and technical reports and research papers in English.  This course consists of three major parts: structural patterns and organizational patterns of technical, Scientific writing; technical reports for scientists and engineers; research papers.
schedule:
Week 　　　　Topic
1, 2, 3　　Structure of Technical, Scientific English (Sentence  Patterns): Definition, Cause and Effect, Comparison and Contrast, Classification, Exemplification, Description
4, 5, 6　　Rhetoric Patterns in Technical English (Patterns of Organization): Definition, Classification/Division, Cause and Effect, Comparison/Contrast, Process, Description
7, 8, 9　　Revision for Readability: Revision for Accuracy, Conciseness and Clarity
10　　Mid-term Examination
11-12　　Informal Reports: Recommendation Reports, Progress/Periodical Reports, Feasibility Reports
13　　Formal Reports
14　　Proposals
15-17　　Writing a Research Paper: Abstract, Introduction, Materials and Methods, Results and Discussion
18　　Final Examination/Oral Presentation
scorePolicy:
Evaluation:
Writing tasks and oral presentations: 50%
Examinations: 30%
Technical report or proposal: 20%
